title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: March 13, 2023, 12:33:20 PMLast edit: March 13, 2023, 01:23:33 PM by cafter
content: I am a brave browser user, many of you may already know that we can earn BAT tokens from brave browser, so i earned many BAT tokens ,If you are from country where brave browser is supported ( check here if your country is listed here or not, If listed than you can get my BAT Tokens)first of all check if you are a regular user of brave creator check here what is brave creator : https://creators.brave.com/no_jsif you have gemini or uphold account than i will tip you my 60 to 70 BAT tokens in your creator account, ( like you have a youtube channel than i can tip you in BAT token through brave browser then you can withdraw it)first check you are able to withdraw from brave creator account or not, if you are new and just created the creator account by hearing that i am giving free BAT token then it may be a problem for you you may face problems while withdrawing,if you are aware of all of these terms above and know about brave creator and withdrawn your funds from brave reward(BAT Token) successfully a couple of times then send you channel link or any account link which is connected to your brave creator accountafter withdrawing BAT tokens send my reward to this BAT Address : (i will update soon)after taking 30% of tokensif you are new to brave browser then i am sure you do not understood anything written above then don't comment anything and surf other topics keep clean

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Why would you ask to send 30% if you already donated/tipped 60/70 of bat token?Why not get the 30% off before you donated/tip creators?It looks suspicious and what I think is the tip is came from someone else brave browser/wallet?

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on March 13, 2023, 12:58:26 PMWhy would you ask to send 30% if you already donated/tipped 60/70 of bat token?Why not get the 30% off before you donated/tip creators?It looks suspicious and what I think is the tip is came from someone else brave browser/wallet?you seems like you doesn't know about brave rewards, don't get suspicious , brave reward is banned in my country and i earned some tokens so i want to withdraw in that country where brave rewards is supportedi thought i tip 30% to the withdrawer

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.created_time: March 13, 2023, 03:22:27 PMLast edit: March 13, 2023, 04:05:26 PM by YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 13, 2023, 12:33:20 PMif you are new to brave browser then i am sure you do not understood anything written above then don't comment anything and surf other topics keep clean How did you come here to say that you are clean, while you act stupid outside this forum towards the community that joins the Creators.brave.com web.I am no stranger to the web Creators.brave.com, which is labeled a troublemaker for the internet community.Rows of problems faced by the Creators.brave.com community and a myriad of problems.1. Problem paymentQuoteI do not believe if the brave scam, but there is a problem with pending payout and that’s a pretty serious problem for publishers. and to this day I still don’t get paid for this month, whether it’s not paid or waiting for the following month. but yes never mind … stop being a brave publisher2. No payment for a year / Brave CreatorsQuoteI have been using Brave Browser for several years.My Brave Creator account is connected to Uphold and verified.Unfortunately, I have not received a payout since December 2020, although there are still almost 20 BAT displayed.Payout is pending since one year and the report is being created. Nothing changes.I already tried to re-link and verify uphold but no money is sent to uphold. What can I do?Thank you and best regards jonas3. Publisher account got suspended4. It’s really hurt you knowQuotetoday is payment day, but suddenly my account has suspended. it’s like i see a light in front of my face it’s really close, but suddenly it’s become dark.You come here... this is the Bitcointalk forum, anyone, if they know there is an obligation to warn the public about the web offering bogus rewards.Quote from: cafter on March 13, 2023, 03:43:12 PMmeans brave doesn't pay to creator accounts ?more or less, that's a fact.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 13, 2023, 12:33:20 PMif you are new to brave browser then i am sure you do not understood anything written above then don't comment anything and surf other topics keep clean I just need to understand one thing here. What benefit do you get by tipping free bat tokens ?Don't say that you are doing it without any personal benefit. There is nothing free in this world. I would like to know your intention in doing such a generous act

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: No matter what you say I don't know why you're wasting your time and the members' time with this nonsense, Brave Browser is a waste of time if you only want to use it to get tokens from browsing ads.You browse ads for a whole month to get 20-30 BAT which equals less than $5. This is a waste of time.The only good thing about Brave Browser is maintaining privacy and blocking annoying ads.
